jobDescription: -Complete all relevant trainings for the assigned tasks in a timely manner -Own, drive, and be accountable for assigned processes -Write and deploy procedures associated with the assigned business processes -Establish and/or maintain business performance metrics for the key assigned business areas -Conduct daily business activities in accordance with the foundation of J&J; Credo Minimum B.S. degree in Engineering, Chemistry or Biology is required. Degree in Engineering preferred. Strong analytical skillsStrong relationship building and negotiation skillsAbility to identify and report trends/emerging issuesStrong data management skillsProficient in Microsoft Excel and other electronic data management/analysis/reporting applicationsAbility to translate findings into recommended actionsBusiness acumen in multiple functions preferredTechnical background a plus; some understanding/ limited experience relating to chemicals and packaging componentsWorks well in team environmentAbility to work in a matrix team environment expected
